extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     (MATH221 or MATH280) and (STAT268 or STAT351), or permission of the Department.

basic.description: Basic techniques of statistical estimation such as best unbiased estimates, moment estimates, maximum likelihood. Bayesian methods. Hypotheses testing. Classical distributions such as the t-distribution, F-distribution, beta distribution. These methods will be illustrated by simple linear regression. Statistical computing.
basic.subject: STAT
basic.title: Statistics and Probability II
